name: Cat² Ascension
description:
Cat² Ascension is a bouncy cat game created for Mini Jam 127: Cats².

The game may display incorrectly in some browsers. Please try the Windows or Mac version for the best performance.

Controls

MoveWASD or arrow keysBounce, (comma)Shoot. (dot)

Credits

  • Code and (most) graphics: Muellerberndt
  • Music: Mateoninho (Soundcloud / Youtube)

Additional  assets used:

  • 16x16 Industrial Tileset by 0x72
  • Clouds by LateNightCoffee
